subtitles.text: The group Uka is a six-member idol group.
Uka is a junior group of Momokuro and Ellis Junior High School, and is a hot group with nostalgic, sweet and sour songs like those from a coming-of-age novel.
Uka has been filming a music video for a new song while enjoying the city of Osaka.
This time we visited Nakazaki-cho, a town that represents Osaka's retro atmosphere.
The next spot, a somewhat nostalgic and nostalgic spot, is a general store called Orinpepe-san.
The shop is a psychedelic and pop sundries store that has evolved uniquely in Japan based on the concept of "me Showa-era everything store".
It is a store that deals in clothing.
We came up with this project!
